body_html:
Ok, this is really weird. Can you sprinkle ps -ef bazel in between commands so we get the PID of the bazel process (to see when it restarted)?
Other than that, I know it's a lot to ask, but can you try using bazel from head (I was told there have been a couple of fixes regarding when to rebuild the config)?

body:
Ok, this is really weird. Can you sprinkle ps -ef bazel in between commands so we get the PID of the bazel process (to see when it restarted)?
Other than that, I know it's a lot to ask, but can you try using bazel from head (I was told there have been a couple of fixes regarding when to rebuild the config)?
